sourcesContent:
import { Box, Typography } from "@mui/material";
import Image from "next/image";
import addressIcon from "../../static/images/icons/address.svg";
import letterIcon from "../../static/images/icons/letter.svg";
import royalEntertainmentIcon from "../../static/images/icons/royal-entertainment.svg";
import telephoneIcon from "../../static/images/icons/telephone.svg";
import logoImage from "../../static/images/logo-werunweshare.png";
import { useStyles } from "./styles";

function Footer() {
  const { classes } = useStyles();
  return (
    <Box className={classes.footerContainer}>
      <Box className={classes.footerBox}>
        <Box className={classes.logoWrapper}>
          <Image src={logoImage} alt="logo" />
        </Box>

        <Box className={classes.infoContainer}>
          <Typography className={classes.footerTitle}>
            Thông tin liên hệ
          </Typography>

          <Box className={classes.contentContainer}>
            <Box className={classes.descInfoContainer}>
              <Box width="18.77px">
                <Image src={letterIcon} alt="letter" />
              </Box>

              <Box className={classes.descContainer}>
                <Typography className={classes.footerDesc}>
                  info@regroup.vn
                </Typography>
                <Typography className={classes.footerDesc}>
                  hoangquan@regroup.vn
                </Typography>
              </Box>
            </Box>

            <Box className={classes.descInfoContainer}>
              <Box width="18.77px">
                <Image src={telephoneIcon} alt="telephone-icon" />
              </Box>

              <Box className={classes.descContainer}>
                <Typography className={classes.footerDesc}>
                  02543 835938
                </Typography>
                <Typography className={classes.footerDesc}>
                  09692865666 (Mr. Đông Hồ)
                </Typography>
              </Box>
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </Box>

        <Box className={classes.infoContainer}>
          <Typography className={classes.footerTitle}>Địa chỉ</Typography>

          <Box className={classes.contentContainer} gap="32px !important">
            <Box className={classes.descInfoContainer}>
              <Box width="18.77px">
                <Image src={addressIcon} alt="address-icon" />
              </Box>

              <Box className={classes.descContainer}>
                <Typography className={classes.footerDesc}>
                  183 Binh Gia st. Ward 8. Vung Tau City
                </Typography>
              </Box>
            </Box>

            <Box className={classes.lastDescContainer}>
              <Typography className={classes.footerDesc}>
                Đơn vị tổ chức
              </Typography>

              <Box width="85px">
                <Image src={royalEntertainmentIcon} alt="royal-entertainment" />
              </Box>
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </Box>
      </Box>

      <Typography className={classes.copyRight}>
        © 2022 We run we share . All rights reserved
      </Typography>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default Footer;
